thread.section_title: WTSmedia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WTSmedia | www.wtsmedia.com
thread.title: Mark Reinhardt

author: Mark Reinhardt
title: Mark Reinhardt
text:
We've been in the conference recording/production/duplication business for 17 years now (early 2017), and we found WTS about 16 years ago. We've worked with our rep Christy Bowen that entire time, and she's ALWAYS been attentive, courteous, professional, knowledgeable and just downright helpful 100% of the time. They have always seemed to have the products I need, and it's a pleasure to be able to call Christy, tell her what I need, and know it will almost always ship same day, at good market prices. The last couple years I have needed large quantities of pre-printed CDRs, and I found WTS to be fast to produce and ship and fair on price too. Having known Christy as my sales rep for all these years, I have begun to count her also as a friend, as I genuinely believe she actually cares about how we are doing on every level of our business. I have recommended them to others in the past and continue to do so.
Mark Reinhardt
Rhino Technologies
